Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. We understand the significant value you place on this product, which aligns closely with our assessment of its worth. Should you decide to proceed, we are confident it will enhance your operations or personal endeavors significantly. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
